title: Tom Green County Sheriffs Identifies Deceased Man Found Near Mineral Wells Crossing

SearchSearch:Search Advertise With Us In Case You Missed It FOX Football Live Jobs TV Listings **Tom Green County Sheriff's Office identifies deceased man that was found near Mineral Wells Crossing** TOM GREEN COUNTY, Texas — Authorities have identified a body found last Thursday near Mineral Wells Crossing as a Christoval man reported missing days earlier. The Tom Green County Sheriff's Office confirmed the deceased is Abram David Clark, 39. Deputies were notified around 12:22 p.m. last Thursday of a body discovery. Responding deputies located a deceased male with an apparent gunshot wound and a firearm nearby. Clark had been reported missing from the Christoval area several days before his body was found. An autopsy was conducted by the Texas Panhandle Forensics office. The investigation remains ongoing. The Tom Green County Sheriff's Office is asking anyone with information to contact them at 325-655-8111.
